abella event Tell Kagha "I wanted to see what happen" after the Arabella event Prod the bird to death After dealing with Kagha, telll Zevlor you don't care about his other problem Disapproves of accepting the poison from Nettie While talking to Arabella's Parents , Blame them for Arabella's situation
